AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: cabbage farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a farmer and developed a fascination for the cabbage plant. When [PAWN_nameDef] accidentally discovered the Cabbage of Power, [PAWN_possessive] life changed forever.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cabbage of Power grenadier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has mastered the art of lobbing Cabbage of Power grenades. [PAWN_possessive] ability to throw grenades with deadly precision is unmatched, though it takes [PAWN_possessive] a bit longer to aim. [PAWN_pronoun] is considered a special forces warrior for [PAWN_possessive] Faction. To hone [PAWN_possessive] power, [PAWN_pronoun] will not distract [PAWN_objective]self with any physical labor, nor perform most menial tasks.
